https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2MoDl9aDRfDpd5JsRi0T0kJ8bdI.jpg In order to escape from the loan sharks, Bala takes his wife and son to hide in his ancestral home. However, things turn eerie when he feels the presence of ghosts in the house. Anandhapurathu Veedu
